archimate:Requirement.name: AT-3(2): Role-based Training | Physical Security Controls
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Provide [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] with initial and [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] training in the employment and operation of physical security controls.

properties.value: Physical security controls include physical access control devices, physical intrusion and detection alarms, operating procedures for facility security guards, and monitoring or surveillance equipment.
